short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flip the direction of the knights on lichess.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flip Lichess Knights allows you to customize your board UI when playing chess on lichess.org.  By default knights on Lichess face to the right.  Flip Lichess Knights allows you to toggle their direction, so they can face either to the right or to the left.
